abstract: Senate votes 93 to 5 to confirm Ashton B Carter as nation's next secretary of defense; Carter will succeed his former boss Chuck Hagel as United States increases its military action against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The Senate overwhelmingly confirmed Ashton B. Carter to replace Chuck Hagel, installing a new Pentagon chief as the United States increases military action against the Islamic State.

headline.main: Senate Gives Approval for Defense Secretary, if Not His Boss’s Policies
headline.print_headline: Senate Gives Approval for Defense Secretary, if Not His Boss’s Policies
headline.seo: Ashton B. Carter Is Confirmed as Defense Chief, Replacing Chuck Hagel

snippet: The Senate overwhelmingly confirmed Ashton B. Carter to replace Chuck Hagel, installing a new Pentagon chief as the United States increases military action against the Islamic State.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
